about_the_game:
Can you survive the Game Master or will you become another victim?


Upon waking up in a boarded-up room, you will have to follow the instructions of a mad man to help figure out the solution to his twisted games. Be wary though, his instructions may just lead you to your doom.

Endure 9 levels of puzzles, challenges, and combat!


Experience a variety of levels that end up being a rollercoaster ride full of terrifying clowns and puzzles. Deadly traps and enemies around every corner. Never knowing when you will be safe, until you find your trusty double barrel. Just then, maybe you can turn things around in your favor.

Multiple weapons and enemies to fight!


From your trusty axe to your assault rifle, there are 4 base weapons in the game to help your survival. Test your skills against multiple clown enemies that have different behaviors that match their masks. Do not count the Game Master out of the fight either.

content_descriptors.notes:
The developers describe the content like this:

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

detailed_description:
Can you survive the Game Master or will you become another victim?


Upon waking up in a boarded-up room, you will have to follow the instructions of a mad man to help figure out the solution to his twisted games. Be wary though, his instructions may just lead you to your doom.

Endure 9 levels of puzzles, challenges, and combat!


Experience a variety of levels that end up being a rollercoaster ride full of terrifying clowns and puzzles. Deadly traps and enemies around every corner. Never knowing when you will be safe, until you find your trusty double barrel. Just then, maybe you can turn things around in your favor.

Multiple weapons and enemies to fight!


From your trusty axe to your assault rifle, there are 4 base weapons in the game to help your survival. Test your skills against multiple clown enemies that have different behaviors that match their masks. Do not count the Game Master out of the fight either.
name: Live Or Die Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Pro 64-bit (10.0, Build 18363)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-10750H CPU @ 2.60GHz (12 CPUs), ~2.6GHz
  • Memory: 16384 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 Super
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Pro 64-bit (10.0, Build 18363)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-10750H CPU @ 2.60GHz (12 CPUs), ~2.6GHz
  • Memory: 16384 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 Super
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

short_description: You have been selected as a new contestant to play in a twisted puzzle game designed by an up and coming serial killer known as the Game Master. Using your intuition and survival skills, can you stay one step ahead of the Game Master or end up as another one of his many victims?
